logs.msg: Goals: (1) Test SharedWriter with tokio async, (2) Check if ratatui widgets can render status/progress alongside rustyline-async input, (3) Evaluate multi-line input behavior, (4) Measure any perf impact. If viable, this replaces our custom Viewport::Inline approach.

Spike complete: rustyline-async is single-line only (NOT viable). reedline has multi-line via Validator + ExternalPrinter for concurrent output (viable). Created examples/reedline_spike.rs for testing. Recommend trying reedline with prompt-based status display first.
